about_the_game:
The uplifting, Retro, SNES-inspired soundtrack from The Cauldron Kids: The Summoning of Mr Vermicelli.



1. The Cauldron Kids
2. Everybody Wants To Wear The Hat
3. House Tour
4. Baba's Theme
5. Song of Swooning
6. Pantry Run
7. The Myth of Sisyphus (Kitchen Edition)
8. Bouncy Waltz
9. Agumneth the Cruel (Would Have Named This Song Differently)
10. Everyone! Start Panicking!
11. Orbital Captain Baba
12. Hypervillain Archnemesis Theme
13. Fruit Thief
14. Something Incredible is About to Happen!!!!
15. Look At This Little Guy
16. Hats Off
